title: EquityTypeEnum
description: Represents an enumeration list to identify the type of Equity.

oneOf.title: NonConvertiblePreference
oneOf.description: Identifies an Equity of Non-Convertible Preference, Shares which hold priority to receive capital return in event of issuer liquidation.

oneOf.title: Ordinary
oneOf.description: Identifies an Equity of Common stocks and shares.
